snippet: Gus Malzahn of Auburn was named coach of the year, and Austin Seferian-Jenkins of Washington won the John Mackey Award as the nation’s top tight end.
abstract: Auburn University football coach Gus Malzahn is named coach of the year; other college football awards news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gus Malzahn of Auburn was named coach of the year, and Austin Seferian-Jenkins of Washington won the John Mackey Award as the nation’s top tight end.

headline.main: Auburn’s Malzahn Named Coach of the Year
